result.execSummary:
The defendant Merwin J Wynos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Escape-Criminal Arrest, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.42(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Imposed but orderd to run concurrent with prison sentence.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Merwin J Wynos

defendant.name: Wynos, Merwin J

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Attny Siehr indicates defendant started serving his federal sentence May 2016 (6 years 3+3) and will continue running with State sentence.  Plea questionnaire completed.  Defendant enters a plea of no contest.  Court advises party of their rights, finds factual basis, accepts defendant's waiver of their rights, the plea made, and finds guilty.  Arguments as to penalty.  Court orders 2 years (1 confinement + 1 ES) consecutive to 15CF105.  WEDS, voting and firearms restrictions noted.  Appeal rights.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 22, 2017 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court with attorney Gabriel G. Siehr.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This was the date set for a plea/sentencing, however, Attny Siehr is requesting an additional adjournment to get further information from the Federal Bureau of Prisons.  State does not object.  Defendant has been sentenced in federal court.  Requests a reduction in his case bond to allow defendant to be a trustee.  Court reduces bond to $1,000.00 cash.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 4, 2017 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court with attorney Gabriel G. Siehr.  Defendant Merwin J Wynos in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attny Siehr requests an adjournment as to date he has not gotten a response from the Federal Court about defendant's sentence imposed there.  Court grants an adjournment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 5, 2017 at 11:15 am.  Bond continued.
Attny Siehr indicates he needs some additional time to verify information regarding defendant's federal sentence.
State's

records.addlTxt: pages 1-10

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court with attorney Gabriel G. Siehr.  Defendant Merwin J Wynos in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Need to be scheduled for a pre-trial conference.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 27, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Gabriel Siehr
Defendant does not want Tiny Gouty Yellow to represent anymore.  There has been a lack of communication.  Court will all attorney to withdraw.  Bond continued.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 12, 2016 at 09:15 am.

records.descr: Answer to demand for discovery and inspection

records.addlTxt: from DA to Atty Gouty-Yellow re: Discovery pg's 1-10 & driver/criminal record
Not Guilty.

Attorney Tina F. Gouty-Yellow appeared by video means for Defendant Merwin J Wynos. Prosecuting Atty Scott E. Niemi appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Waive reading of information.  Not Guilty plea entered.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 16, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court, in custody.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attny Tina Gouty-Yellow was appointed to represent.  Requested an adjourned date.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Tina Gouty-Yellow

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court, in custody.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Judicial assistant informs the court that Atty Haacke does not represent the defendant and an attorney has not been appointed as of yet.  Reschedule to next week.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Defendant Merwin J Wynos in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This was the date for an arraignment however, defendant is requesting another attorney be appointed.  Attny Haacke will hold off on the arraignment until new counsel is appointed.  Arraignment scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Subpoena for 5/16/2016 - Preliminary Hearing

Defendant Merwin J Wynos in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Defendant Merwin J Wynos in custody.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Arraignment scheduled for May 31, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Ronald Haacke
Defendant Merwin J Wynos appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Scott E. Niemi appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 16, 2016 at 10:45 am.
